attributes.background: Suffolk County Council, in collaboration with the Suffolk District Councils, have launched a consultation for an Ipswich Northern Bypass which if built will devastate the natural beauty of our county. We must all work together in a cohesive manner to stop the construction of this route.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on the Ipswich Northern Bypass are a matter for your local authority.  
 
You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors 
 
Suffolk County Council  also has a petitions process - you can find out more about it here: 
 
https://www.suffolk.gov.uk/council-and-democracy/consultations-petitions-and-elections/starting-a-petition/
